unnormalised: Barabor, konnem gastritis sambhalli kiteak mhunn vicharlem, barem? Mhaka mhojem anubhav sangta. Mhaka mhoinneam pasun bhayankar pett dukhtaali. Surveak, hanv antacids gheun swatahkuch ilaj kortalo - ENO, Gelusil, soglle zaite! - mhaka distaale kiteak mhunn acidity aasa mhunn. Punn dukha lagataich raavli. Tea dukha laavta aslyaa, khaas korun tikhtache jevonn khatlea uprant (ji, satya sangtaan, amche gharaan soglle jevnna tikhtache asata!). Hanven mhoji nani sangta to ghutti ilaj pann kele - all and ajwain. Kitem chui mhaka sasannik aram dilem na.
normalised: Borem, konnen tori gastritis samballpache vixim vicharlem, bare? Mhaka mhojem anubhav sangta. Mhaka mhoinyam pasun bhayanak pett dukhtalem. Survatek, hanv svota-uch upchar kortalom antacids gheun – E-N-O, Gelusil, sogllem gheun! – tem fattim acidity asa mhunn chintun. Punn dukhin soddlem na. Tem ek jollop jashi disthali, khas korun tikhat jevonn zalea uprant (jem, sutt-ti mhunnlear, amchea ghorant almost dor ek jevonn!). Hanvem mhoje nani sangtale gharguti upai-uy korun dekhle – aale ani ajwain. Konnainch mhaka suttka dilina.

unnormalised: Nimannem, mhoji bail Aisha zor ditli mhaka ek Dr. disonk. Ami ek gastroenterologistache koden gele, Dr. Sharma, Fortis Hospital-ant. Mhoji laksana sanglea uprant ani thoddi physical exam kortan, tika gastritis aasa mhunn dhokho gello ani tinnem endoscopy suchoylem. Sotya sangtaan, mhaka bhay dislo! Punn ti process mhaka disle titli bhayankar nasli. Tika 30 mintam laglim.
normalised: Nimannem, mhaje bayle Aishan mhaka Doctorak voch mhunn insist kelem. Ami ek gastroenterologistak gele, Doctor Sharma, Fortis Hospitalant. Mhaje lakshnani sangtalea ani lagich physical exam kelea uprant, tinnem gastritis mhunn dharle ani endoscopy-chi suchovnni keli. Eakdom sach mhunnlear, hanv bhienkulo aslo! Punn procedure itti vait asli na mhunn hanvem chintlelem. Tis minute lagle.

unnormalised: Endoscopyn potant gastritis aasa mhunn potthaylem ani mhaka H. pylori infection aasa mhunn pann koll'llem. Dr. Sharman antibiotics ani PPIs (proton pump inhibitors) dile - specifically, Omeprazole 20mg don pavti disaan ani don anik drugam jinchi navn mhaka atam yaad na. Plus, ek ghott diet. Tikhtachem jevonn naka, caffeine naka (chai khup kathin aslem!), ani alcohol pann naka. Tinnem jivan shailint badal kor mhunn pann suchoylem, jeze stress kami kor mhunn, kiteak stress gastritis vaddhovta.
normalised: Endoscopy-n dakhlem mhaka gastritis asa, ani tem dislem mhaka H. pylori infection asun. Doctor Sharman antibiotics ani P-P-Is (proton pump inhibitors)-chi course sangli – khas korun, Omeprazole vis milligram disak don pauti ani ani don osdhyo je mhaka atam nava sodunk zaina. Ani sangatauch, ek strict diet. Ani tikhat jevonn naka, caffeine naka (chai ek tras aslo!), ani alcohol naka. Tinnem lifestyle bodlopache suchoile mhunn stres komi kor, kiteak stres-an gastritis vaddoita.

unnormalised: Thoddea haftaam laglem, punn mhaka bara distaaka laglem. Mhaka atam kaddeech kasht bhognaat jitlea voilem diet soddlear (hello, samosas!), punn pot khushi aasa. Mhaka salla kitea mhunn? Sasannik pettt dukhta maka mhunn durlaksha kor naka. Ek gastroenterologist dissa, bara diagnosis kara, ani tanchi treatment plan follow kara. Swatahkuch treatment korunk thoddo vell aram mellta, punn tumhi vhoddle problem lipoytat. Bara bhaag!
normalised: Thodde xim lagle, punn mhaka borem disunk laglem. Maka atam-uy konn'nak pett dukhata zalea hanv dietar cheat korta (hello, samosas!), punn overall, mhojem pett khuxi asa. Mhunn mhaji budh? Tum pett dukhta aslear taka dukhlaka vochona. Ek gastroenterologistak bhett, proper diagnosis ghe ani tanchea upchariche yojnank follow kara. Svota upchar kelear temporary aram podta, punn tum ek vhodd problem lupoita astolo. Tumkam borem zanv!
